text: Speaking from personal experience it makes very little sense to not separate the infra for different node networks. It will cost you roughly the same if your on any of the hyper-scalers cloud platforms.

text:
Hello! I have a question — we're setting up the validator with Okta as the Id Provider for a client using catalyst. In this particular setup, the `typ` claim in the JWT token is `application/okta-internal-at+jwt` instead of the usual `JWT`.
I’ve seen references to the `java-jwt` library as a decoder in DA’s codebase, which I believe doesn’t validate this claim.
Will this be an issue for the validator?
Thanks!

instead of the usual
JWT

.
I’ve seen references to the
java-jwt

library as a decoder in DA’s codebase, which I believe doesn’t validate this claim.
Will this be an issue for the validator?
Thanks!
